Uses of Interface
org.cloudsimplus.listeners.EventListener

  • Packages that use EventListener 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core  
    org.cloudsimplus.builders  
    org.cloudsimplus.listeners  

    • Uses of EventListener in org.cloudbus.cloudsim

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that return EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventListener<VmToCloudletEventInfo> CloudletAbstract.getOnCloudletFinishEventListener() 
      EventListener<VmToCloudletEventInfo> Cloudlet.getOnCloudletFinishEventListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified when a cloudlet finishes its execution at a given Vm.
      EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> VmSimple.getOnHostAllocationListener() 
      EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> Vm.getOnHostAllocationListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified when a Host is allocated to the Vm, that is, when the Vm is placed into a given Host.
      EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> VmSimple.getOnHostDeallocationListener() 
      EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> Vm.getOnHostDeallocationListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified when a Host is deallocated to the Vm, that is, when the Vm is moved/removed from the Host is was placed.
      EventListener<VmToCloudletEventInfo> CloudletAbstract.getOnUpdateCloudletProcessingListener() 
      EventListener<VmToCloudletEventInfo> Cloudlet.getOnUpdateCloudletProcessingListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified every time when the processing of the Cloudlet is updated in its Vm.
      EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> VmSimple.getOnUpdateVmProcessingListener() 
      EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> Vm.getOnUpdateVmProcessingListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified every time when the processing of the Vm is updated in its Host.
      EventListener<HostUpdatesVmsProcessingEventInfo> HostSimple.getOnUpdateVmsProcessingListener() 
      EventListener<HostUpdatesVmsProcessingEventInfo> Host.getOnUpdateVmsProcessingListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified every time when the host updates the processing of all its VMs.
      EventListener<DatacenterToVmEventInfo> VmSimple.getOnVmCreationFailureListener() 
      EventListener<DatacenterToVmEventInfo> Vm.getOnVmCreationFailureListener()
      Gets the listener object that will be notified when a Vm fail in being placed for lack of a Host in the Datacenter with enough resources.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim with parameters of type EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Vm VmSimple.setOnHostDeallocationListener(EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> onHostDeallocationListener) 
      Vm Vm.setOnHostDeallocationListener(EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> onHostDeallocationListener)
      Sets the listener object that will be notified when a Host is deallocated to the Vm, that is, when the Vm is moved/removed from the Host it was placed.

      Cloudlet Cloudlet.setOnUpdateCloudletProcessingListener(EventListener<VmToCloudletEventInfo> onUpdateCloudletProcessingListener)

      Vm Vm.setOnUpdateVmProcessingListener(EventListener<HostToVmEventInfo> onUpdateVmProcessingListener)
      Sets the listener object that will be notified every time when the processing of the Vm is updated in its Host.
      Host HostSimple.setOnUpdateVmsProcessingListener(EventListener<HostUpdatesVmsProcessingEventInfo> onUpdateVmsProcessingListener) 
      Host Host.setOnUpdateVmsProcessingListener(EventListener<HostUpdatesVmsProcessingEventInfo> onUpdateVmsProcessingListener)
      Sets the listener object that will be notified every time when the host updates the processing of all its VMs.
      Vm VmSimple.setOnVmCreationFailureListener(EventListener<DatacenterToVmEventInfo> onVmCreationFailureListener) 
      Vm Vm.setOnVmCreationFailureListener(EventListener<DatacenterToVmEventInfo> onVmCreationFailureListener)

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core that return EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EventListener<SimEvent> CloudSim.getOnEventProcessingListener()
      Gets the EventListener object that will be notified when any event is processed by CloudSim.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void CloudSim.setOnEventProcessingListener(EventListener<SimEvent> onEventProcessingListener)
      Sets the EventListener object that will be notified when any event is processed by CloudSim.

    • Uses of EventListener in org.cloudsimplus.listeners

      Fields in org.cloudsimplus.listeners declared as EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static EventListener EventListener.NULL
      A implementation of Null Object pattern that makes nothing (it doesn't perform any operation on each existing method).
